code: import{sessions}from'../sessions';import{getUsers}from'../api';import{ROLE}from'../constants';export const fetchUsers=async hash=>{const accessRoles=[ROLE.ADMIN];const access=await sessions.access(hash,accessRoles);if(!access){return{error:'Доступ запрещен',res:null};}const users=await getUsers();return{error:null,res:users};};
